publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-457 Rosie Kane: US Treatment of Human Shields to Iraq—That the Parliament condemns the actions of the US Treasury's Office of Foreign Assets Control in imposing fines and custodial sentences on individuals who travelled to Iraq to act as human shields and commends those individuals on their humanitarian actions during the recent war.
S2M-457 US Treatment of Human Shields to Iraq (lodged on 6 October 2003) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-457 Rosie Kane: US Treatment of Human Shields to Iraq—That the Parliament condemns the actions of the US Treasury's Office of Foreign Assets Control in imposing fines and custodial sentences on individuals who travelled to Iraq to act as human shields and commends those individuals on their humanitarian actions during the recent war. Supported by: Frances Curran, Carolyn Leckie, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Chris Ballance, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-457 US Treatment of Human Shields to Iraq (lodged on 6 October 2003) Donald Gorrie*, John Swinburne*
S2M-457 US Treatment of Human Shields to Iraq (lodged on 6 October 2003) Elaine Smith*
